## Quarto

library(psych)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(foreign)
library(ggplot2)

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

#QUESTION1-NONCOLONIA
```{r}
qual2 |>
  filter(preg_uno != 'NA')|>
  filter(colonia == 'No') |>
 count(preg_uno) |>
mutate(prob = n/sum(n))

```

#QUESTION1-LACOLONIA
```{r}
qual2 |>
  filter(preg_uno != 'NA')|>
  filter(colonia == 'Yes') |>
 count(preg_uno) |>
mutate(prob = n/sum(n))
```
